rows.label: qst101604_msg0001
rows.name: So I was destined for defeat, was I?

rows.label: qst101604_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought I was pretty good.
But you guys are something else.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0003
rows.name:
Go on, take it. My grandpa's treasure.
My treasure.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0005
rows.name:
I wasn't good enough. I couldn't
get all the pieces myself.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0006
rows.name:
Hmm? Wait a sec... Show me those
pieces again, would you?

rows.label: qst101604_msg0007
rows.name:
If you put each set of three together,
it looks like they'll form two shapes...
a circle and a square.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0009
rows.name:
"Gather ye the pieces three and three
and the hero's treasure ye shall reap."

rows.label: qst101604_msg0011
rows.name:
But it doesn't seem like these shapes
themselves are the treasure...

rows.label: qst101604_msg0012
rows.name:
Well, whatever. From now on, the
treasure hunting's up to you.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0013
rows.name:
Seek out that ancient Nopon treasure
for me, would you?

rows.label: qst101604_msg0014
rows.name:
As for me, I'll just have to find myself
some new treasure to hunt for!
